controls.title: Control Environment
controls.description: The entity demonstrates a commitment to integrity and ethical values.

controls.title: Board Oversight
controls.description: The board of directors demonstrates independence from management and exercises oversight.

controls.title: Organizational Structure
controls.description: Management establishes structures, reporting lines, and authorities.

controls.title: Risk Assessment
controls.description: The entity identifies and assesses risks to the achievement of objectives.

controls.title: Fraud Risk Assessment
controls.description: Risks of fraud are considered in the design of controls.

controls.title: Assess Changes
controls.description: The entity identifies and assesses significant changes that could impact the system.

controls.title: Control Activities
controls.description: Control activities are designed and implemented to mitigate risks.

controls.title: Logical Access
controls.description: Logical access security is managed through role-based access, authentication, and authorization.

controls.title: Change Management
controls.description: Changes are authorized, tested, approved, and documented.

controls.title: System Monitoring
controls.description: System components and activities are monitored and anomalies detected.

controls.title: Policies and Procedures
controls.description: Policies and procedures are established and maintained.

controls.title: Incident Detection
controls.description: Incidents are detected, analyzed, and escalated.

controls.title: Incident Response
controls.description: Incidents are responded to and communicated.

controls.title: Evaluate Issues
controls.description: The entity evaluates deviations and identifies corrective actions.

controls.title: Continuous Improvement
controls.description: Processes are improved based on monitoring and reviews.
